title: Verizon will bump unlimited data plan by $20
text:
Verizon will bump unlimited data plan by $20 
Published By: AndroidGuys.com - Today 
Verizon plans to raise the price of its unlimited data plan to $59.99, an increase of $20 per month. While this sounds likes like a jerk mov...
